i want the 2 latest batman movies as well... its strange they dont have any decent torrents here...

but if you can switch between normal & SDH subs with the remote (i think since you have embedded 2 sub tracks)

why not just embed the foreign language subs as the first sub track and the full SDH sub as the 2nd sub track?

if you have ATV set to displays subs, wont it automatically display the first sub track for the foreign language parts only when you play the movie?
oh okay. i hope you dont take my comments the wrong way. i am totally appreciative of your work and if i came off as a jerk i do apologize...

tr108, thanks for the uploads on all your offerings. As an educator from a underfunded school district, I rely on any of the media resources I can get. Whether they be popular movies with archetypical themes and symbols (such as this one) or current ebooks that our district doesn't purchase...thanks for making it available.
Will you be uploading 'The Avengers' when it's released on iTunes?

You may have noticed, the selection of your uploads that have over one hundred seeds happen to be MarvelStudios, hopefully you follow the obvious pattern of public preference and upload the Spider-man trilogy....and then maybe move on to DC Comics :D Im sure alot of other TechRod Fans will agree with me :D Also may i request a the ability to subscribe to you, so i can set all your upcoming torrent to download automatically
Great torrent! Thanks

so great to see you have added the subs!!
